```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(gtsummary)

data <- data |> drop_na()
data <- data |> mutate(high_physical_activity = ifelse(TMIMS > 16000, "yes", "no"))
data |> select(-c(SEQN, CHD, education)) |> tbl_summary(by=high_physical_activity)
```
